purpose: Demonstrate universal FSCBAC application to external books outside the Ricardo Demi corpus.

examples.title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
examples.fit_score_comment: High suitability due to sequencing visuals, gentle emotional arc, and low linguistic load.
examples.note: External canonical example. Shows that FSCBAC applies to globally known books.

examples.title: Goodnight Moon
examples.fit_score_comment: Strong fit driven by emotional rhythm, soothing repetition, and minimal visual complexity.
examples.note: Example of a classic bedtime story outside the demonstration corpus.

interpretation: These examples prove that FSCBAC can score and rank external books without requiring them to belong to the Ricardo Demi catalog.
The standard is universal and not tied to any specific author.
